## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with [x] -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments where appropriate

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Security

- [ ] I have checked for potential security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, secrets, etc.) is exposed
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where necessary

### Database

- [ ] Database migrations are included (if applicable)
- [ ] Migration is backward compatible
- [ ] Indexes are added for frequently queried columns

### Performance

- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] No N+1 queries introduced
- [ ] Large lists are paginated
